enum.name: MAV_CMD
enum.description: Commands to be executed by the MAV. They can be executed on user request, or as part of a mission script. If the action is used in a mission, the parameter mapping to the waypoint/mission message is as follows: Param 1, Param 2, Param 3, Param 4, X: Param 5, Y:Param 6, Z:Param 7. This command list is similar what ARINC 424 is for commercial aircraft: A data format how to interpret waypoint/mission data.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_AVIATA_FINALIZE_DOCKING
entry.description: Configure the mixer once docked based on the docking slot and the missing drones. Also update PID values, flight controller orientation, etc.
entry.param: 1-indexed slot number of 1st missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 2nd missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 3rd missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 4th missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 5th missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 6th missing drone, or 0 if not missing

entry.name: MAV_CMD_AVIATA_SET_CONFIGURATION
entry.description: Update the mixer according to which drones are missing.
entry.param: 1-indexed slot number of 1st missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 2nd missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 3rd missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 4th missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 5th missing drone, or 0 if not missing
1-indexed slot number of 6th missing drone, or 0 if not missing

entry.name: MAV_CMD_AVIATA_SET_STANDALONE
entry.description: Set mixer and parameters back to the values for a standalone drone.
